panels.description: Number of network peers the node is connected to
panels.title: Peer Count

panels.description: Network timeout is dynamic parameter indicating how long will node wait for response, latency is the actual time to response.
panels.title: Network Timing

alert.message: High number of messages sent per second
alert.name: Messages Sent per Second alert

alert.message: High number of messages failed per second
alert.name: Messages Failed per Second alert

panels.description: Amount of the stake in AVAX that is benched (ignored) because the nodes are unhealthy
panels.title: Benched stake

panels.description: The amount of time, on average, that we wait to acquire bytes from the throttler before reading a message.
panels.title: Throttler Acquire Latency

panels.description: Number of messages waiting to acquire bytes from the message throttler.
panels.title: Throttler Awaiting Acquire

panels.description: Number of messages that are currently being handled and haven't yet returned their bytes to the message throttler.
panels.title: Throttler Awaiting Release (Messages Processing)

panels.description: Number of bytes left in the at-large byte allocation for incoming messages
panels.title: Throttler Remaining At-Large Bytyes

panels.description: Number of bytes left in the validator byte allocation for incoming messages
panels.title: Throttler Remaining Validator Bytyes
